title: Free Birthday Cards
description:
Birthday Cards for Facebook is the #1 globally downloaded Birthday Cards app for the Facebook platform, now on your Android device. Easily send unique digital cards to your friends directly from the app. It's absolutely free and 100% fun. Never miss a friend's birthday ever again!
# See your friends' birthdays in chronological order (past, present and future) on our easy-to-use infinity loop display
# Get reminders leading up to and on the day of your friends' birthdays
# Browse our awesome selection of digital birthday cards which you can send and receive for free
# Get reminded of other significant events to celebrate like holidays
# Add our widget to your home screen to see upcoming birthdays!
It's easy to get started. Simply download the app, synch your Facebook account or pull birthdays from contacts, and start spreading the joy!
Bring a smile to a friend's face. Download Birthday Cards for Facebook today!
****FAQ****
Q: Is it free?
A: Yes! You can post our beautiful cards to your friends' Facebook walls absolutely free. We do offer some premium cards and other premium services but you don't need to buy anything if you don't want to. The ability to send cards to friends is free, no strings attached.
Q: It doesn't have all my friends' birthdays listed. Why?
A: The application uses information provided by Facebook and from your contacts. If we cannot get access to this information (either it doesn't exist or the platform doesn't give us that info), then we allow you to manually select your friend and input their birthday. Our app will then remember this information for next year :)
Check us out at https://www.bdaycards.com
=======
- Terms of Service: https://intelly.works/terms.html
- Privacy Policy: https://intelly.works/privacy.html
Email us at bday@intelly.works with any feedback or questions!
